Text: New Babya Boy John Andrew Capone born at am John weighs pounds ounces and is long Karen John are both doing well Karens hospital phone is Talk to everyone soon Tom

The WeddingKevin I tried to call you at work today but you had already left I then tried to call you at home but I have an old or wrong ph I just wanted to say that I am so sorry I cant come to the wedding I was actually coming by myself because EVERYONE we asked to baby sit couldnt for that Saturday I was really looking forward to it The problem is that I am having problems with my episiotomy from the delivery It has not healed properly and I am still having pain I wont know until my appointment next week but the doctor said that I have to go back in the hospital and get recut and restitched and then I have to wait to heal all over again I dont know all the details but I am assuming it will feel the same as it did just after the baby I was told I couldnt do much of anything for about weeks I asked to have the procedure early but they said I have to wait to heal completely or it may not be strong enough to hold the stitches Johns Baptism is on Oct and my parents are coming up so I need to have it done weeks prior to that which puts your wedding right in the middle The doctor said there was a slight chance it could heal on its own but it is doubtful I just wanted to let you know that I am so bummed that I wont be there I was so psyched to see Rich Frank Kampy and your family Ill let you know if anything changes but for now it looks like Im going to miss the most important day of your life Give me a call Thanks Karen
